SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? (hours paid assistance).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Paid Personal Care per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? hours unpaid (family, others).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Unpaid Personal Care per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How much time is someone with you in your home to assist you with activities that require remembering, decision making, or judgment?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Cognitive Assistance at Home per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How much of the time is someone with you to help you with remembering, decision making, or judgment when you go away from your home?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Cognitive Assistance Away From Home per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Hours Out of Bed per Day
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - On a typical day, how many hours are you out of bed?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours Out of Bed per Day

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Days Out of the House per Week
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - In a typical week, how many days do you get out of your house and go somewhere?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Days Out of the House per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Nights Away From Home Last Year
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - In the last year, how many nights have you spent away from your home?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Nights Away From Home Last Year

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Hours of Paid Work per Week
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours of Paid Work per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid? (occupation).
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Occupation of Paid Work

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend in school working toward a degree or in an accredited technical training program?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours of Schoolwork per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend in active homemaking including parenting, housekeeping, and food preparation?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours of Homemaking per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Hours of Home Maintenance per Week
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend in home maintenance activities such as gardening, house repairs or home improvement?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours of Home Maintenance per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many hours per week do you spend in recreational activities such as sports, exercise, playing cards, or going to movies?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Hours of Recreational Activities per Week

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Number of People You Live With
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many people do you live with?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Number of People You Live With

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Live With Spouse or Signif Other
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - Is one of them your spouse or significant other?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Live With Spouse or Significant Other

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: CHSF2-Number of Relatives You Live With
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - Of the people you live with how many are relatives?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Number of Relatives You Live With

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many business or organizational associates do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Associates Contacted per Month

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - How many friends do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Friends Contacted per Month

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - With how many strangers have you initiated a conversation in the last month?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Initiated Conversation With Strangers Last Month

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - Approximately what was the combined annual income, in the last year, of all family members in your household?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Combined Annual Household Income Last Year

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Paper Version - Approximately how much did you pay last year for medical care expenses?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: CHART-SF Paper Version - Medical Care Expense Last Year
